categories: Category:Star Wars: Edge of the Empire adventures

nodes.text: Sabaac Game on the Row is a roleplaying modular encounter included in Suns of Fortune, a supplement for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game.
While visiting Treasure Ship Row in Corellia's notorious Blue Sector of Coronet City, the PCs get themselves into a sabacc game. Naturally, they get more trouble than they bid on.
